mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO dashboard ( user_id, dashid, dashname, regdate, web, mobile, tablet ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{dashid}, #{dashname}, #{regdate}, #{web}, #{mobile}, #{tablet} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.dashid, a.dashname, a.web, a.mobile, a.tablet FROM dashboard a WHERE user_id = 'cho'
